clinical_study.brief_title: Impact of Angiotensin II Type 2 Receptor Agonists Treatment in Patients With COVID 19 (COVID-ARA2)
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Previous Treatment With Angiotensin II Type 2 Receptor Agonists in Patients With SARS-Cov2 Infection Admitted to the Intensive Care Unit on Survival and Severity of the Disease (COVID-ARA2)

brief_summary.textblock:
The actual pandemic infection related to SARS-CoV2 results in viral pneumonitis (COVID-19),
      that may, in the more severe cases, lead the patients to the intensive care unit (ICU). The
      more frequent presentation is acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).

      To penetrate cells, SARS-CoV2 uses Angioconvertase type 2 (ACE2) as a cellular entry
      receptor.

      ACE2 belong to the renin-angiotensin-aldosteron system (SRAA), and ACE2 levels are directly
      modified when SRAA inhibitors are administred to patients, and ACE2 level increases
      particularely with Angiotensin II Type 2 Receptor Agonists (ARA2) use.

      The aim of our study is to determine ACE2 level and activity in patients with SARSCoV2
      infection admitted to the intensive care unit (ICU).

      COVID ARA2 is a propsective cohort of patient with blood sampling at the day of admission,
      day 3 and day 7.

detailed_description.textblock:
The actual pandemic infection related to SARS-CoV2 results in viral pneumonitis (COVID-19),
      that may, in the more severe cases, lead the patients to the intensive care unit (ICU). The
      more frequent presentation is acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).

      To penetrate cells, SARS-CoV2 uses Angioconvertase type 2 (ACE2) as a cellular entry
      receptor.

      ACE2 belong to the renin-angiotensin-aldosteron system (SRAA), and ACE2 levels are directly
      modified when SRAA inhibitors are administred to patients, and ACE2 level increases
      particularely with Angiotensin II Type 2 Receptor Agonists (ARA2) use.

      The aim of our study is to determine ACE2 level and activity in patients with SARSCoV2
      infection admitted to the intensive care unit (ICU).

      COVID ARA2 is a propsective cohort of patient with blood sampling at the day of admission,
      day 3 and day 7.

biospec_descr.textblock:
Blood sample for measurement of ACE 2 level and ACE 2 activity (ratio
      Angiotensin(1-7)/Angiotensin(1-10))

study_pop.textblock:
Participants :

          -  will be admitted to the ICU for respiratory failure in a context of proven COVID.

          -  will be, or not, treated for chronic hypertension,

          -  will need, or not, mechanical ventilation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  admission to the intensive care unit,

          -  with a proven COVID infection, responsible for acute respiratory failure

          -  agree with participation to the study.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  aged under 18

          -  under legal protection

          -  pregnant or breastfeeding
